channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- BigInsights
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- BigInsights

item.title: CVE-2017-1553|2024-08-05T13:39:30.597Z -- ibm -- biginsights
item.description: IBM Infosphere BigInsights 4.2.0 and 4.2.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 131397.

item.title: CVE-2017-1336|2024-08-05T13:32:29.553Z -- ibm -- biginsights
item.description: IBM Infosphere BigInsights 4.2.0 could allow an attacker to inject code that could allow access to restricted data and files. IBM X-Force ID: 126244.

item.title: CVE-2017-1554|2024-08-05T13:39:30.634Z -- ibm -- biginsights
item.description: IBM Infosphere BigInsights 4.2.0 and 4.2.5 could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 131398.

item.title: CVE-2017-1552|2024-08-05T13:39:30.634Z -- ibm -- biginsights
item.description: IBM Infosphere BigInsights 4.2.0 and 4.2.5 is vulnerable to link injection. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted URL link, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking. IBM X-Force ID: 131396.
